mapper.select: select id from users where id=#{id} and rownum=1
select a.authority, u.pwd pwd from users u, authorities a where u.id = a.id and u.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into users(id, pwd, irum, email) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{irum}, #{email})
mapper.update: update users set pwd=#{pwd} where id=#{id} and rownum = 1
update users set irum=#{irum} where id=#{id} and rownum = 1
update users set irum=#{irum}, email=#{email} where id=#{id} and rownum=1
